  • Constructor Details

    • HangmanController

      public HangmanController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Called after the application has been fully processed. Randomly chooses a word and sets it up in the display. Adds the hangman shape pieces to the main array.

    • newGameClicked

      public void newGameClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Called when "File -> New Game" has been clicked. Starts a new game by resetting all variables to their default state.
      Parameters:
      event - event related to the action

    • onConfirmClicked

      public void onConfirmClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Called when the "Guess" button is clicked or guessTextField is active and Enter is pressed. Checks if the given guess in the guessTextField is correct. The results of their guess will be given to them in the helpLabel and the game state will be updated. If the user enters something invalid they will also be notified via the helpLabel.
      Parameters:
      event - related to the action

    • randomlyChooseWord

      public void randomlyChooseWord()
      Randomly chooses a word from the POSSIBLE_WORDS array.

    • updateHangman

      public void updateHangman()
      Gets the shape at the current hangman index in the hangmanShapes array and shows it

    • isWordFullyGuessed

      public boolean isWordFullyGuessed()
      Checks if every value in the showChar array is true.
      Returns:
      whether the user has correctly guessed all letters in the word

    • isHangmanDead

      public boolean isHangmanDead()
      Checks if the current handmanIndex is greater than or equal to the number of hangman pieces.
      Returns:
      whether the user has shown the full hangman

    • setHangmanWord

      public void setHangmanWord()
      Uses the current word and the showChar array to represent the current state of the hangman game in the wordTextField.
